title: MarketWatch - How to Ease the Housing Shortage
description: Like much of the country, Vermont is grappling with an acute housing shortage. MarketWatch reporter Eleanor Laise talks with Seth Leonard of the Vermont Housing Finance Agency about state and local policies that can help address the problem.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Like much of the country, Vermont is grappling with an acute housing shortage. MarketWatch reporter Eleanor Laise talks with Seth Leonard of the Vermont Housing Finance Agency about state and local policies that can help address the problem.
